name: Magic Caravan
description:
Magic Caravan is a reversed Tower Defense game.

Objective: Have a set amount of wagons reach the end of the track before reaching the maximum number of turn.

The game is separated in turns. Each turn is separated in a preparation phase and a wave phase. Left-click and drag to move around.
Preparation phase: build your train by buying wagons. Be careful about the element you choose, fire is strong against earth, earth against water and water against fire.
Wave phase: steer your wagons to take the most appropriate path by clicking the arrows at each switching points. Changing the direction in the middle of a caravan will split it into 2. Caravans meeting will merge back together.

Resources to buy wagons are given at the start of each phase.
